tool_description: Analyzes insurance benefits and coverage details for specific procedures, including copays, deductibles, and coverage percentages.

procedure_codes.description: List of CPT or ICD-10 procedure codes

provider_npi.description: National Provider Identifier of the treating provider

facility_type.description: Type of facility: inpatient, outpatient, office, emergency

error_messages: Invalid procedure codes: Ensure all CPT/ICD-10 codes are properly formatted and current.
Provider not in network: The specified NPI is not in the patient's insurance network.

Invalid facility type: Use one of [inpatient, outpatient, office, emergency].
usage: Provide insurance details, procedure codes, provider NPI, and service information to analyze coverage benefits and patient financial responsibility.

covered_procedures.description: List of procedure codes covered by insurance

coverage_percentage.description: Percentage of costs covered by insurance

deductible_remaining.description: Remaining deductible amount for the year
